Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.domain

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.domain.DiagramComponent
      • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.domain.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvocationMessage, ResultMessage

    public class Message
extends DiagramComponent
    A class of messages. Each message has a receiving - and a sender party.
